item.description:
Howdy! If you are looking for a different way to spend your Saturday evening come on out to the Midnight Rodeo Bar. So.....you've never had the chance to line dance? Come take Michelle's fun, easy lessons at 7:30...am sure you will laugh and have a good time. CRISIS will be the band this Saturday. If you are looking to meet new people this is the place! Come join us! There is a meetup table located near the bar or feel free to sit with your friends. See ya there....

BIG welcome to our newest member E. James Perullo!! See ya on the dance floor!
item.name: Midnight Rodeo Bar Meetup
